updates.title: RBI Floating Rate Savings Bonds 2024
updates.description: Government-backed savings bonds with floating interest rate linked to NSC. Current rate: 8.05% p.a. Ideal for conservative investors seeking safe returns with sovereign guarantee.
updates.fullDescription: The RBI Floating Rate Savings Bonds offer a unique combination of safety and competitive returns. The interest rate is reset every six months based on the prevailing NSC rate. These bonds are ideal for senior citizens and conservative investors looking for regular income with capital safety.

updates.title: Sovereign Gold Bonds (SGB) - Series IV
updates.description: Invest in gold digitally with additional 2.5% annual interest. Capital gains tax-free on maturity. Better than physical gold investment.
updates.fullDescription: SGBs are government securities denominated in grams of gold. They are substitutes for holding physical gold. Investors have to pay the issue price in cash and the bonds will be redeemed in cash on maturity.

updates.title: NPS Vatsalya Launched for Children
updates.description: New pension scheme for minors. Parents can now start retirement planning for children from birth. Contribution up to ₹50,000/year eligible for 80CCD(1B).
updates.fullDescription: NPS Vatsalya allows parents to open pension accounts for their minor children. The account will be converted to a regular NPS account when the child turns 18. This ensures early financial planning and the power of compounding over decades.

updates.title: NHAI Tax-Free Bonds 2024
updates.description: AAA-rated infrastructure bonds offering tax-free interest. Limited issuance for retail investors. Lock-in period of 10-15 years.
updates.fullDescription: NHAI Tax-Free Bonds are ideal for investors in the highest tax bracket looking for stable, tax-free returns. The bonds are backed by the government and offer complete safety of capital.

updates.title: New LTCG Tax Rules - FY 2024-25
updates.description: Equity LTCG tax increased to 12.5% from 10%. Exemption limit raised to ₹1.25 lakh from ₹1 lakh. Plan your tax harvesting accordingly.
updates.fullDescription: The Union Budget 2024 introduced changes to Long Term Capital Gains tax on equity. While the rate increased, the exemption limit was also raised. Investors should plan their exits and tax harvesting strategies accordingly.

updates.title: Complete Guide to Mutual Fund Selection
updates.description: A comprehensive PDF guide on how to select the right mutual funds based on your goals, risk profile, and investment horizon.

updates.title: HDFC Ltd NCDs - December 2024
updates.description: AAA-rated Non-Convertible Debentures from HDFC Ltd offering attractive returns for medium-term investors.

updates.title: RBI Keeps Repo Rate Unchanged at 6.5%
updates.description: The Reserve Bank of India maintained the repo rate at 6.5% for the 11th consecutive meeting. Impact on loans and deposits explained.
